titleStmt.title: SII 8.16: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 16. (A.R. No. 430 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE VALMIKANATHA TEMPLE AT SEYYUR, MADURANTAKAM TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . virame tuṇaiyākavun tiyākame yaṇiyākavuñ ceṅko locci k=karuṅkali kaṭin=tu kūṭalcaṅkamattu hāĀhavamallaṉai yañcuvittu vikkalaṉaiyuñ ciṅkaṇaṉaiyum Uṭaipuṟaṅ kaṇṭu maṟṟavaṉ mahādeviyoṭum vastuvāhanaṅ kaikkkoṇṭu Iraṇṭāmvicaiyiluṅ kuṟitta kaḷattu hāhavamallaṉai yañcuvittut tan muṉṉavar viratamuṭittu veṅkaināṭu miṭṭaruḷi vijaiyābhiṣekam paṇṇi virasiṁhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirājakesaripanmarā
ṉa Uṭaiyār śrīvirarājentradevark=ku yāṇṭu Añcāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuc cempūrkkoṭṭattup puṟaiyūrnāṭṭuc ceyyūrāṉa jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūrp puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭaruḷiṉa mahādevarkku senāpatimārāyaṉ maturāntakanāṉa rājarājanayapālaneṉ Ittevark=ku pūrvāṇhasan=ti Oṉṟiṉuk=kut tiruvamurtariyci nānāḻik=kum kaṟiyamurtukkum neyyamurtuk=kum Aṭaik=kāyamurtuk=kum santiviḷak=ku Āṟuk=kum Āka san=ti Oṉṟiṉuk=ku nellup patak=ku muṉṉāḻik=ku Innāṭṭu Eṉ kāṇi ceyyūrāṉa virarājentranallūr
nirnilattu Iṟaiyiliyāka viṭṭa nilattuk=kuk kiḻpāṟkellai tiraiyacekaraṉ ceṟuvuk=kum palliṟuppāṉkarampaik=kum meṟkum vaṭapāṟkellai vaḷavatarayaṉceṟuvukku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai palliṟuppāṉkarampaiyk=kum tillampaḷḷittukkup pāyum vāykkālukku vaṭakku taṭi Iraṇṭukku vaṭak=kum melpāṟkellai nikarilicoḻavatiyiṉ kiḻiṉ taṭi muṉṟukkuk kiḻakkum Iṉṉāṟpālellaik kuḷḷum naṭuvu kiṇaṟu Akappaṭa caṭaiyaṉceṟuvu taṭi Iraṇṭināl pati
neṇcāṇkolālk kuḻi Eḻunūṟṟaṟupattiraṇṭe mākāṇiyum Ittevarkku Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṟaiyiḻicci kal veṭṭuvittuk kuṭutteṉ senāpati mārāyaṉ maturān=takanāṉa rājarājanayapālaneṉ . Ittaṉmam Iṟakkuvā
The record is incomplete; but only a small portion is wanting at the end.
Digital edition of SII 8.16 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
